blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

summary: Title: Learning To Love Again chapter twenty-three heaven  Summary: Phil has three conversations. one with his daughter about...
body:
Title: Learning To Love Again

chapter twenty-three heaven 

Summary: Phil has three conversations. one with his daughter about loving someone in heaven, one with his angel of a past wife now in heaven, and one with Dan; the newest and last love of his life.

An insight at the types of conversations Phil has about Dan, how much he really loves him and the types of things they talk about on the phone when they aren’t together.

a/n: theres some mentions of blood, be careful <3 let me know if you like this and want to see more from Phil’s world

excerpt:

“Dad?” she asked softly, her voice similar to her mother’s without the Irish behind it.

“Yes sweetheart?”

“Do you believe in heaven?”

from the beginning

body:
Old school “friend”

Person B loves parties, “meeting” new people, is a great dancer and even harder drinker

Person A is the exact opposite but still occasionally tags along ..even though half way through the night B suddenly disappears

One night though, person A meets an old “school friend” and the second they see each other, they’re all over each other

A: wait why are you even here ?

The friend just has a questioning mimik

A: “yeah you’re right . We both know I don’t really care about you or your life”

Both: *continue kissing*

Person B, who saw all that, doesn’t know what just happens and doesn’t understand why they’re suddenly so angry

reblog.comment:

blog.name: knlalla
blog.title: ??¿¿?¿
blog.description:
katie || 24 || not straight || she/her || my ao3

hello lovelies thanks for joining me
tell me about your day

tags: like good luck finding someone this supportive
giving each other shit but actually being super supportive
summary: (slightly) demon: i love times where they notice the other is doing something a little different appearance-wise, like dan...
question: (slightly) demon: i love times where they notice the other is doing something a little different appearance-wise, like dan asking "whats with the glasses?" in an early gaming vid, and phil asking "whats with the curls?" in the pastel edit vid. i love that its clearly part of a chain, right, because just hanging around the house they see one another in curls and glasses long before they started doing so on camera, and afterwards its just compliments and confidence boosts: we stan supportive bfs!
answer:
jfc they are just so cute i mean you know that’s what happened with the quiff as well, phil just casually pushing his hair up off his forehead and dan being like “that looks really fucking good you’d better fuckin keep that” 

send ur fave demon moments

reblog.comment:
jfc they are just so cute i mean you know that’s what happened with the quiff as well, phil just casually pushing his hair up off his forehead and dan being like “that looks really fucking good you’d better fuckin keep that” 

send ur fave demon moments

trail.content_raw:
jfc they are just so cute i mean you know that’s what happened with the quiff as well, phil just casually pushing his hair up off his forehead and dan being like “that looks really fucking good you’d better fuckin keep that” 

send ur fave demon moments
